 王泉明 清华大学化学系教授，博士生导师

联系方式

地点：清华大学化学系，何添楼221

邮编：100084

Tel/Fax：010-62780347

Email：qmwang@mail.tsinghua.edu.cn

课题组网页：http://wangqmlab.org.cn/index.asp

教育背景

1985-1989 厦门大学化学系，学士

1989-1992 厦门大学化学系，硕士

1998-2001 香港中文大学化学系，博士

工作履历

1992-1998 中国科学院福建物质结构研究所

2001-2002 香港中文大学化学系，博士后

2002-2004 美国Rochester University化学系, 博士后

2004-2005 美国加利福利亚大学河滨分校（UC Riverside）化学系，博士后

2005-2015 厦门大学化学化工学院，教授，博导

2015- 清华大学化学系，教授，博导

学术兼职

《化学学报》编委

研究领域

金属团簇化学

奖励与荣誉

2001 获香港中文大学“青年学者论文奖”

2006 入选“教育部新世纪优秀人才支持计划”

2011 获“国家杰出青年科学基金”

学术成果

代表性论文

1. Zong-Jie Guan, Jiu-Lian Zeng, Zi-Ang Nan, Xian-Kai Wan, Yu-Mei Lin,* andQuan-Ming Wang*, Thiacalix[4]arene : New Protection for Metal Nanoclusters,Sci. Adv.2016;2: e1600323.

2. Chloride-Promoted Formation of a Bimetallic Nanocluster Au80Ag30 and the Total Structure Determination, Jiu-Lian Zeng, Zong-Jie Guan, Yang Du, Zi-Ang Nan, Yu-Mei Lin,* andQuan-Ming Wang*,J. Am. Chem. Soc.2016,138, 7848-7851.

3. Yu Wang, Xian-Kai Wan, Liting Ren, Haifeng Su, Gang Li, Sami Malola, Shuichao Lin, Zichao Tang, Hannu Hakkinen, Boon K. Teo,Quan-Ming Wang,* and Nanfeng Zheng*,Atomically Precise Alkynyl-Protected Metal Nanoclusters as a Model Catalyst: Observation of Promoting Effect of Surface Ligands on Catalysis by Metal Nanoparticles,J. Am. Chem. Soc.2016,138, 3278-3281.

4. Quan-Ming Wang*, Yu-Mei Lin, Kuan-Guan Liu, Role of Anions Associated with the Formation and Properties of Silver Clusters,Acc. Chem. Res.2015,48,1570-1579.

5. Xian-Kai Wan, Wen Wu Xu, Shang-Fu Yuan, Yi Gao,* Xiao-Cheng Zeng, and Quan-Ming Wang*, Near Infrared Emissive Alkynyl-Protected Au24Nanocluster,Angew. Chem. Int. Ed., 2015,54, 9683-9686.

6. Xian-Kai Wan, Shang-Fu Yuan, Qing Tang, De-en Jiang,* andQuan-Ming Wang*, Alkynyl-Protected Au23Nanocluster: A 12-Electron System,Angew. Chem. Int. Ed., 2015, 54, 5977-5980.

7. Xiao-Li Pei, Yang Yang, Zhen Lei, Shan-Shan Chang, Zong-Jie Guan, Xian-Kai Wan, Ting-Bin Wen, andQuan-Ming Wang*, Highly Active Gold(I)-Silver(I) Oxo Cluster Activating sp3C-H Bonds of Methyl Ketones under Mild Conditions,J. Am. Chem. Soc. 2015,137, 5520-5525.

8. Xian-Kai Wan, Qing Tang, Shang-Fu Yuan, De-en Jiang,* andQuan-Ming Wang*, Au19 Nanocluster Featuring a V？Shaped Alkynyl？Gold Motif,J. Am. Chem. Soc.2015, 137, 652？655.

9. Yang Yang, Jian-Hua Jia, Xiao-Li Pei, Hao Zheng, Zi-Ang Nan andQuan-Ming Wang*, Diastereoselective synthesis of O symmetric heterometallic cubic cages,Chem. Commun., 2015, 51, 3804？3807.

10. Zhen Lei, Xiao-Li Pei, Zhan-Guo Jiang andQuan-Ming Wang*, Cluster Linker Approach: Preparation of a Luminescent Porous Framework with NbO Topology by Linking Silver Ions with Gold(I) Clusters,Angew. Chem. Int. Ed.2014,53, 12771-12775.

11. Xian-Kai Wan, Shang-Fu Yuan, Zhi-Wei Lin andQuan-Ming Wang*, Chiral Gold Nanocluster Au20Protected by Tetradentate Phosphines,Angew. Chem. Int. Ed.2014,53,5923-5926.

12. Zhan-Guo Jiang, Kang Shi, Yu-Mei Lin* andQuan-Ming Wang*, [Ag70(PW9O34)2(tBuC≡C)44(H2O)2]8+: Ionothermal Synthesis of a Silver Cluster Encapsulating Lacunary Polyoxometalate Ions,Chem. Comm.2014, 50, 2353-2355.

13. Yang Yang, Xiao-Li Pei andQuan-Ming Wang*, Postclustering Covalent Modification for Chirality Control and Chiral Sensing,J. Am. Chem. Soc.2013,135, 16184.

14. Xiao-Li Pei, Yang Yang, Zhen Lei andQuan-Ming Wang*, Geminal Tetraauration of Acetonitrile: Hemilabile Phosphine-Stabilized Au8Ag4Cluster Compounds,J. Am. Chem. Soc.2013,135, 6435.

15. Xian-Kai Wan, Zhi-Wei Lin andQuan-Ming Wang*, Au20 Nanocluster Protected by Hemilabile Phosphines,J. Am. Chem. Soc.2012,134, 14750.

16. Li-Qin Mo, Jian-Hua Jia, Li-Jia Sun andQuan-Ming Wang*, Solvent-induced intercluster rearrangements and the reversible luminescence responses in sulfide bridged gold(I)–silver(I) clusters,Chem. Commun.2012,48, 8691.

17. Ying Xiao andQuan-Ming Wang*, Luminescence Responsive Charge Transfer Intercluster Crystals,Chem. Eur. J.2012,18, 11184.

18. Yang-Juan Li, Zhi-Ying Deng, Xue-Fei Xu, Hua-Bin Wu, Ze-Xing Cao andQuan-Ming Wang*, Methanol triggered ligand flip isomerization in a binuclear copper(I) complex and the luminescence response,Chem. Commun.2011, 47, 9179.

19. Jian-Hua Jia, Jing-Xia Liang, Zhen Lei, Ze-Xing Cao andQuan-Mming Wang*, Luminescent gold(I)-copper(I) clusters with unprecedented carbon-centered trigonal prismatic hexagold,Chem. Commun.2011, 4739.

20. Gen Li, Zhen Lei andQuan-Ming Wang*, Luminescent Molecular Ag-S Nanocluster [Ag62S13(SBut)32](BF4)4,J. Am. Chem. Soc.2010,132, 17678.

21. Hua-Bin Wu, Zhi-Jun Huang andQuan-Ming Wang*, Unprecedented Solution Stable Silver Ethynediyl Clusters,Chem. Eur. J.2010,16, 16321.

22. Juan Qiao, Kang Shi,Quan-Ming Wang*, Giant Silver Alkynyl Cage with Sixty Silver(I) Ions Clustering around Polyoxometalate Templates,Angew. Chem. Int. Ed.2010,49, 1765.

23. Jian-Hua Jia,Quan-Ming Wang*, Intensely Luminescent Gold(I)-Silver(I) Cluster with Hypercoordinated Carbon,J. Am. Chem. Soc.2009,131, 16634.

24. Shu-Dan Bian, Jian-Hua Jia andQuan-Ming Wang*, High-nuclearity silver clusters templated by carbonates generated from atmospheric carbon dioxide fixation,J. Am. Chem. Soc.2009, 131, 3422.

25. Shu-Dan Bian, Hua-Bin Wu andQuan-Ming Wang*, A facile template approach to high-nuclearity silver(I) alkynyl clusters,Angew. Chem. Int. Ed.2009,49, 536.

26. Hua-Bin Wu andQuan-Ming Wang*, Construction of Heterometallic Cages with Tripodal Metalloligands,Angew. Chem. Int. Ed.2009,49, 7343.

27. Mei-Li Chen, Xue-Fei Xu, Ze-Xing Cao,Quan-Ming Wang*, Ligand and Anion-Controlled Formation of Silver Alkynyl Oligomers from Soluble Precursors,Inorg. Chem.2008,47, 1877.

28. Shu-Dan Bian,Quan-Ming Wang*, Snowman-like silver alkynyl cluster consolidated by templating chloride and peripheral trifluoroacetates,Chem. Commun.2008, 5586.

29. Quan-Ming Wang, Young-A Lee, Olga Crespo, Joseph Deaton, Ching Tang, Henry Gysling, M. C. Gimeno, Carmen Larraz, M. D. Villacampa, Antonio Laguna, Richard Eisenberg*, Intensely Luminescent Gold(I)-Silver(I) Clusters with Tunable Structural Features,J. Am. Chem. Soc.2004, 126, 9488-9489. (Highlighted inScience2004, 305, 575).

30. Quan-Ming Wangand Thomas C. W. Mak*, Facile construction of anionic silver(I) aggregates with embedded acetylide and cyanide,Angew. Chem. Int. Ed.2002,41(21), 4135-4137.

31. Quan-Ming Wangand Thomas C. W. Mak*, Crown-Ether-Directed Assembly of Discrete and One-Dimensional Silver Aggregates Containing Embedded Acetylenediide,Angew. Chem. Int. Ed,2001,40, 1130-1133.

32. Quan-Ming Wangand Thomas C. W. Mak*, Argentophilicity and Solvent-Induced Structural Diversity in Double Salts of Silver Acetylide with Silver Perfluoroalkyl Carboxylates,J. Am. Chem. Soc,2001,123, 7594-7600.

33. Quan-Ming Wangand Thomas C. W. Mak*, Ellipptic Column Consolidated by Acetylide Dianion, Cyanide and Trifluoroacetate in a Novel Quadruple Salt of Silver(I),J. Am. Chem. Soc. 2001,123, 1501-1502.

34. Quan-Ming Wangand Thomas C. W. Mak*, Novel Honeycomb-Like Layered Structure: The First Isomorphous Triple Salts of Silver Acetylide,J. Am. Chem. Soc.2000,122, 7608-7609.
